message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. As we start our negotiation, I'm willing to offer you the product for $9000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product and understand its worth to me. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8500 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering the product at $8800. I believe this is a fair compromise that still reflects the value the product brings to your business.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Alice. It shows a good spirit of negotiation. Based on my budget and the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8700 for the product.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm counteroffering the product at $8600. I think this is a reasonable price that still reflects the value the product brings to your business.

Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. Based on my financial situation and the value I see in the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8550 for the product.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still willing to negotiate, but I need to be mindful of my minimum acceptable price. I'm counteroffering the product at $8500. I think this is the best compromise we can reach at this point.
